name: Countdown Cowboy
description:
Survive the 10-second countdown in 4 unique wild west-themed minigames! These minigames include bottle juggling, saloon showdown, cactus jumping, and tumbleweed dodging. The longer you survive, the harder it gets. How many levels can you make it through with only 3 lives?

This game and all of its assets were made by me (WaffleWorks) in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51. 

Theme: Every 10 Seconds

Enjoy!

How to Play:

Left Mouse Button - shoot, jump

Space Bar - jump

A/Left Arrow, D/Right Arrow - move left and right

Escape: Pause Game

Fonts Used:

https://www.dafont.com/early-gameboy.font

https://www.1001fonts.com/rubber-biscuit-font.html 

https://www.1001fonts.com/yoster-island-font.html
